title: Everyone arguing whether Demacia or Noxus is more manly...

replies.body:
Can't argue with that.

These champs are manly enough to walk around in the freezing temperatures of the Freljord shirtless.
Sounds like Cleveland Browns fans in December....   all 5 of them.
It's because they are Iceborn. Yeah, I count with Riot making up the whole Iceborn lore just to make half-naked champs also in Freljord, kappa.
{{champion:41}}
The cowardly butt pirate with exhaust?
cuz carving his name in a mans bones is cowardly
it is when you had your boys capture him and he's tied up lol
his own men are so scared of him they cant do anything but **obey** him that's some alpha male shit right there.
Sure he looks scary but in reality, he ain't shit. In the lore, he has never even fought anyone or anything.

> The massive Noxian war captain shuddered and dropped his axe as Gangplank rammed his cutlass deep into the man’s gut. Blood bubbled from the warrior’s tattooed lips as he mouthed an unheard curse.

Just a line from his short lore.
Check your facts mate.

Fine he did kill a guy.

But this happened.

> Gangplank’s black and gold teeth gritted in suppressed pain – the Noxian had almost bested him. Nevertheless, he refused to let his crew see his weakness, forcing his lips into a wicked smile.

Very tough. Meanwhile Olaf is fighting something the equivalent of a Baron alone on Bilgewater's Harrowing just to see if he could die. He even fought Sejuani and propably was winning so Sejuani recruited him before it could go too far. To be fair i'd like to see Sejuani fighting without that fucking boar.

Braum punches through a mountain and then uses a door to withstand the weight of it collapsing on him.

Tryndamere can't be killed by any conventional means because of his rage thanks to Aatrox.

And Udyr...well i don't think we need to explain Udyr given what his proficiency is.

He's an old man.
He managed to get a nation of cutthroats and thieves at his feet, keeping his empire together with people's fear of his name.

Swain, the man who is basically in controll of Noxus, wants him dead, Zed, who should very well be able to take out one man, wants him dead

But the thing that makes GP more impressive than the the Freljordians, he did it all **as a human**, no magical immunity to death, no animal spirits giving him power, just a human.
he can shove an orange on up his poopdeck
http://imgur.com/WQlVAcE
I laughed tbh. Upvoted

I've never noticed that EVERY Frejlord champion's clothing is SO impractical. 
+1
They're so hardened, they don't need clothes!
I mean, I don't mind braum being shirtless, it's a shame he doesn't have any less clothing though ;)

Gotta give it to you here ...

Personally, as a girl, I'm going to not pick a side.  But good job.
Personally, as a girl, Freljord is best region! After all, the leaders are female.
Nah Void is best region. They all have no gender :^)

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/31/47/a4/3147a4cbe885fad6e99f95109e65a6f8.jpg

HOW DARE YOU
SHE LIVES NOT IN THE VOID SHE IS DEAD TO US!!!
Holy crap you're right! Never noticed that before tbh.
did you just assume your gender?
I might consider Udyr manly when he no longer looks like a hobo running around in a trash bag.

Demacia has {{champion:5}}, your argument is invalid.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZSS5dEeMX64
Remove trynda pls. He plays like a coward. Add aatrox there plox :^}

Noticed a distinct lack of {{champion:113}} in this thread. Manlier than many of the men, Udyr voli and olaf are all in her camp making one of the manliest bunch of champs. Long live the Winter's Claw!

>Noticed a distinct lack of http://img03.deviantart.net/329a/i/2015/078/9/0/fan_art_lol_chibi_poro_rider_sejuani_by_puddingzz-d8m9v3g.jpg

http://img09.deviantart.net/be85/i/2013/139/a/7/sejuani__winter_s_wrath_by_phibonnachee-d62impj.png "??"

But see, there is a problem...

What we think:

http://img11.deviantart.net/1b75/i/2013/284/a/1/sejuani_by_nielspeterdejong-d6q2lcu.png http://data.whicdn.com/images/153158274/large.png http://img12.deviantart.net/9040/i/2015/107/b/4/sejuani_tsundere_by_datbritishmexican-d7hox3v.png 

What really happens:

http://img10.deviantart.net/0153/i/2015/066/7/6/he_wants_it_by_gigadoodles-d8kuan9.png

-------------------

>Long live the Winter's Claw!

No, no, no...

##**All hail the Frostguard!**

_Frost bitc...ehm,_ witches _ftw!_
http://24.media.tumblr.com/0d27d818203d61cad849e1c365f43561/tumblr_n0jwc6N15B1tof9kfo7_500.png

Since there also came unwarranted unappreciation for what should obviously be a joke, let me try again.

http://img08.deviantart.net/a79e/i/2015/073/2/6/how_i_feel_when_my_main_champion_is_picked_in_lcs_by_kahr_noss-d8lnzwz.jpg
PILTOVER!! We have brawn {{champion:254}} {{champion:164}}  and brains {{champion:51}} {{champion:126}}
{{champion:51}} greatest detective in Piltover, can't solve a simple case from Demacia where the person keeps leaving clues.

{{champion:81}} 
And the girliest man.
As a Norwegian and someone who knows more about Norse gods then Christian ones, I fucking love this.
*one
I thought Satan was considered a god?

Man you sure made it clear in one reply that you indeed know little about Christian religion. 
lol

Thumbs up for the work...but I gotta ask: I thought Jax was Ionian?
http://gameinfo.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/jax/

Brand is also listed as "independant" (aka "other").

_I can also tell, looking at the chart, we need a Void support champ - preferably a female yordle._

Jax and Ryze were both born in ancient Icathia which is in the Shuriman desert.  Because they have no current allegiance, I listed them under Shurima.  The spirit that is Brand who is independent possessed the body of Kegan Rodhe, a bandit from the Freljord.
I withdraw my inquiry - I got nothing on someone with that kind of lore knowledge. :)

As one of Norse descent, I approve of this observation.

GIVE PRAISE TO ODIN, MY NORSE BRETHERIN!
I'm not one to usually accept praise but thanks {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{champion:420}}

{{champion:20}} ?

YAY I'M A VIKING!

>{{champion:20}} "YAY I'M A VIKING!"

Oh yeah...

http://img13.deviantart.net/9169/i/2014/054/3/6/nunu_and_poros_by_holyelfgirl-d77omdf.jpg

xD
